data.text: @KainKravitch @datgi47 @Jarek_Dragon If this didn’t happen I’d be content with letting them die from an easily preventable disease.
@Jarek_Dragon And this is why I wanna move to Canada man. I’m in a country surrounded by idiots like these guys.
@_deralptraum @Jarek_Dragon And this is why I think the mask mandates are necessary. People NEED to stop acting like morons and realize these masks mean something.
@KainKravitch @Jarek_Dragon It is unfortunately true.. and that is what makes them dangerous.
@datgi47 @Jarek_Dragon Unfortunately they also spread and mutate what they catch so it's not as simple as letting the problem sort itself out
@Jarek_Dragon It's okay, one antivaxxer complaining now, later he dies from something that could have been easily prevented, and has been for almost 100 years.

@Jarek_Dragon America is going to have one million dead people because of covid and these fuckers still are against vaccines and masks.

Freedom doesn't mean shit when you're dead.

@Jarek_Dragon Expect there's a similar reason why it's so often tied to "they're out to get me" thinking
When someone’s sick of the world constantly proving them wrong, they might find it easier to invent a hollow little truth than to change themselves enough to find one with meaning.

@Jarek_Dragon That is what happens when someone takes a position based on insecurity instead of belief or reason.
When your entire sense of self-worth is tied to an opinion, that opinion's gonna be how you introduce yourself.
